welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wilrijk, Belgium! Get ready to discover the charming and vibrant city known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories exploring all that Wilrijk has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zoersel Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
